title: Forecast Short-Term Corporate Cash Flow
description: A treasury analyst needs to create a 13-week cash flow forecast for the company.

tasks.description: Gather data on expected cash inflows (e.g., accounts receivable) and outflows (e.g., accounts payable, payroll).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully pulls all required data from various financial systems.

tasks.description: Input the data into the cash flow forecasting model.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately populates the forecasting template.

tasks.description: Generate the 13-week forecast and identify any potential future cash shortfalls.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates the forecast and highlights a potential liquidity issue in week 9.
